msbt.message: Most folks don't know this, but there's a Lunar New Year in addition to the regular one. It's kind of like the cool, secret New Year that only insiders know about, . What do you mean, "like half the world celebrates it"?! I knew about it first!

Did you know that today's the Lunar New Year? I had no idea!I spent months coming up with a perfect resolution for regular New Year so I can blast it on social media. But I'm totally unprepared for this!
So how do YOU celebrate Lunar New Year? Because I'm not really sure what to do with myself! Sure, I could cook up some and belt out a few tunes But that's, like, what I do every .

I've been planning the perfect Lunar New Year itinerary for, like, half an hour. Wanna hear it? OK! First upâ€”! Then we do a little and snack on . Oh! Did I not mention that you'll be doing all these things with me? Ha HA! Surprise, !

Do we really need two different New Year celebrations?<10_4 /> Of course we do, ! And since today's the lunar variety, we should be moonwalking all over the place and drinking . Why ?<10_4 /> I just really like it!
